title: Chat Error
body:
I have encountered this bug were I can't connect to chat, meaning when I join a queue I cant call lane. I have restarted my computer many times, reinstalled the latest patch but it continues to bug out.

Any ideas why this may be happening or how to fix it?

replies.body:
Hey there,

There is currently a known issue affecting chat, network operations are currently working on the problem.

For further updates, see the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) page.
